attributes.action: stop Russell Brand and Jonathan Ross being sacked or prosecuted over their prank on Andrew Sachs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We think the hype over the prank Jonathan Ross & Russell Brand played on Jonathan Ross has been blown all out of proportion. A simple apology is enough. We would like to show our disgust at the way the media spark up witch hunts.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
